TopicTitle: Mechjeb's Ascent Guidance makes rocket tilt and crash

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I don't seem to find posts related to this problem I regularly have : I launch my rocket with the ascent guidance autopilot engaged and shortly after launch it tilts over by itself and crashes if I don't abort in time.  Then it starts to work again after a while, I really don't know why, possibly because I reloaded the saved game or flat out rebooted the game, but again I can't say if this coincidence.  I sometimes play with the staging sequence and it seems to fix the issue, but again I don't know why it worked !

KSP 1.12.3 with RO/RSS + DECQ_SaturnV mods, flying a Saturn V out of RO's and DECQ's parts.

Thanks for any enligntenment.

SVFan
